description: Represents an acquisition within a Flywheel project, including metadata, relationships, and identifiers.

id.description: The unique identifier for the acquisition.
id.title: Acquisition ID

label.description: A human-readable label for the acquisition.
label.title: Acquisition Label

parents.group.description: The group associated with the acquisition.
parents.group.title: Parent Group

parents.project.description: The project associated with the acquisition.
parents.project.title: Parent Project

parents.subject.description: The subject associated with the acquisition.
parents.subject.title: Parent Subject

parents.session.description: The session associated with the acquisition.
parents.session.title: Parent Session

created.description: The timestamp when the acquisition was created.
created.title: Creation Timestamp

modified.description: The timestamp when the acquisition was last modified.
modified.title: Last Modified Timestamp

deleted.description: Indicates whether the subject has been deleted.
deleted.title: Deleted

timestamp.description: The timestamp for the acquisition event.
timestamp.title: Acquisition Timestamp

timezone.description: The timezone associated with the acquisition's timestamp, formatted as a standard timezone string (e.g., 'UTC', 'America/New_York').
timezone.title: Acquisition Timezone

tags.description: A list of tags associated with the acquisition.

uid.description: A unique identifier for the session, typically used for tracking purposes across systems.
uid.title: Session UID

uid_scope.description: The scope or context for the session's unique identifier, providing additional context for its use or meaning.
uid_scope.title: Session UID Scope

source.id.description: The ID of the source object for the subject.
source.id.title: Source ID

source.type.description: The type of the source object for the subject.
source.type.title: Source Type

copy_of.description: The ID of the acquisition this is a copy of.
copy_of.title: Copy Of
